info.name: Ghost racer
info.description: Record/playback addon for Race (in JSON format)
info.author: Awwu, Lordmau5

setting.name: *fillplayerslots
setting.desc: If there are fewer than this number of players in the server, add extra ghosts to act as 'pretend players'.

setting.name: *verboselog
setting.desc: Set to true for 'useful' messages in the server log.

setting.name: *validatespawn
setting.desc: Set to true to validate ghost files for whether the ghost spawns at an actual spawnpoint. False is recommended if the server has maps with scripted teleports at the start.

setting.name: *validatetime
setting.desc: Set to true to validate ghost files for whether the ghost's time matches the actual time gotten by the runner. False is recommended if the server has maps that unfreeze the vehicle before the countdown ends.

setting.name: *hideatstart
setting.desc: Set to true to make the ghost invisible at the start of the race if it's inside a player.

setting.name: *admingroup
setting.desc: To issue certain commands, the player must belong to one of the groups listed.
